projects.title: Budgeting Schedule Automation
projects.description: A comprehensive budgeting dashboard for monitoring.
projects.longDescription:
Making master budgets manually in Excel is tedious and error-prone. You spend hours linking formulas across 13 worksheets. One mistake breaks everything downstream.

This tool automates the boring parts so you can focus on strategy and analysis. Enter your assumptions once. Get all 13 schedules instantly. Change an assumption. See the impact across all schedules immediately.

experiences.description:
Streamlined and implemented an optimized workflow in Sage 300 for validating over 1,000 daily receivables from 3 different CRMs, resulting in a 25% reduction in processing time and enabling faster revenue recognition.

Enhanced financial data integrity by managing complex reconciliations across 6 banks and 7 payment methods; automated key reporting tasks by applying advanced Excel functions, which improved overall accuracy by 20%.

Partnered with a cross-regional team to investigate and resolve complex transactional discrepancies, achieving a 95% resolution rate and minimizing delays in financial closing.

Delivered accurate weekly financial reports, including critical Sage-to-CRM reconciliations and revenue summaries, providing leadership with reliable data for strategic decision-making.

Restructured 30+ key banking ledgers in Google Sheets to create a more robust and error-resistant system; this initiative cut data discrepancies by 30% and improved the speed of financial analysis for the leadership team.

Facilitated the monthly financial close by executing key components, including multi-bank reconciliations, fixed asset depreciation schedules for 200+ assets, and benefit fund calculations for a 35+ person team.

Processed over 300 monthly financial transactions (payments, receipts, JVs) in Microsoft Dynamics, maintaining a 100% audit-ready general ledger for reliable financial reporting.

Conducted detailed variance analysis on 60+ client accounts and 20 investment portfolios, delivering quarterly reports that equipped senior management with actionable insights into performance trends and informed strategic financial planning.

Gained hands-on experience with the company's Excel-based accounting system by processing over 100 financial vouchers monthly; validated entries against tax books and physical records to ensure data accuracy.

Coordinated directly with the Finance Manager during the month-end closing process, preparing key documents including bank reconciliations and initial summary reports.

Facilitated clear financial communication by confirming client payment statuses and cross-referencing payment schedules for the business team.

Collaborated with the external audit team by compiling and organizing requested financial statements and voucher documentation, contributing to an efficient audit process.
